Title: Incandescence
Description:
Some of our incense needs to be burned very slowly to release the right aromas. You can check the heat yourself, of course--but it gets to be a bother.

Fortunately, I've found a solution! If you grind up shards of fire elementals and sprinkle the dust over the incense, you can keep the heat consistent using enchantments. Completely hands-free!

Those shards are a bit hard to come by, though. Could you find some and bring them to my friends back in Loamm?
ObjectivesCompletionText: Deliver the supplies to Dustmonger Topuiz in Loamm.
